title: 2: No Such Thing As Death By Aardvark
content: The second episode of the new podcast from the writers of QI, who discuss the best facts they've found that week. This episode features Dan Schreiber (@schreiberland), James Harkin (@jamesharkin), Anna Ptaszynski (@nosuchthing) & Andrew Hunter Murray (@andrewhunterm).
contentSnippet: The second episode of the new podcast from the writers of QI, who discuss the best facts they've found that week. This episode features Dan Schreiber (@schreiberland), James Harkin (@jamesharkin), Anna Ptaszynski (@nosuchthing) & Andrew Hunter Murray (@andrewhunterm).
